# Flight Reservation System - B.Tech Project

## Project Overview
A Flight Reservation System built with Java, Servlets, JSP, and XML as our B.Tech End Semester project.

## Technologies
- Java 11
- Servlets & JSP
- XML for data storage
- Maven
- Apache Tomcat 9.0

## Architecture
- **Pattern**: MVC (Model-View-Controller)
- **Models**: Flight, Passenger, Booking, Payment, User
- **Views**: JSP pages
- **Controllers**: Servlets
- **Data**: XML files

## Features
1. Flight Search & Booking
2. Passenger Management
3. Ticket Management (book, cancel, view)
4. Admin Dashboard
5. Payment Integration
6. Email Notifications
7. Reports & Analytics
8. User Authentication

## Coding Guidelines
- Follow Java naming conventions
- Use XML for data storage
- Proper error handling
- Session management for authentication
- Input validation
- Simple and clean code
